news.title: The government shutdown is over. The air traffic controller shortage is not
news.summary: Staffing shortages of air traffic controllers forced airlines to chop flights and delay thousands of others. 5 million people were affected by the disruption.

news.title: Berkshire Hathaway's surprising new tech stake
news.summary: Berkshire Hathaway's end-of-Q3 equity portfolio snapshot. There was a notable surprise in Berkshire Hathaway’s end- of-Q4 equity portfolio.

news.title: AI anxiety on the rise: Startup founders react to bubble fears
news.summary: Short sellers like Michael Burry and Jim Chanos are warning that the AI buildout isn’t a one-time investment but a recurring cost wave.

news.title: Trump cuts tariffs on goods like coffee, bananas and beef in bid to slash consumer prices
news.summary: Trump's action exempted black tea, green tea, tomatoes, avocados and cinnamon, among other products, from higher tariffs. Trump's action also exempted black Tea, green Tea, tomatoes and cinnamon.

news.title: Google and Disney reach deal to restore ESPN, ABC to YouTube TV
news.summary: The deal comes after a two-week standoff that resulted in channels like ESPN, ABC and others going dark on the popular YouTube TV streaming service.

news.title: How $5,000 became $31 billion: 5 market lessons from the greatest trader ever
news.summary: Jim Simons’s Medallion Fund averaged 66% annual returns for three decades, using math that would make ChatGPT weep.

news.title: Gold’s moves in ‘lockstep’ with U.S. stocks could point to a brewing market danger
news.summary: Gold's selloff alongside U.S. stocks and bitcoin suggests that trouble could be brewing in financial markets. Gold’s selloff with U.K. stocks, bitcoin and other global markets suggests trouble may be brewing.

news.title: These 13 tech stocks have grown profits rapidly — and their stocks are still on sale
news.summary: Meta, Nvidia and Microsoft shares trade at discounts to their historical valuations. Other plays in the chip and software sectors are also trading at discounts.

news.title: Stocks are caught up in a powerful rotation. Here’s what could deliver a shock.
news.summary: A smooth stock market on the surface is masking nerves and turbulence. The U.S. stock market has been on an upswing since the Great Recession.

news.title: Only one analyst has a sell rating on Nvidia — and he says ‘it feels fantastic’
news.summary: Lone Nvidia bear Jay Goldberg shares why he’s still not a buyer of the AI superstock. Goldberg: “I don’t think they’re going to be the next Facebook or Google.”
